Crl.M.C. No.8285 of 2017
Dated this the 8" day of December, 2017
ORDER
Cri.M.C. is disposed of by directing the court
below to grant exemption from personal appearance to the
petitioner, as far as practicable. Considering the peculiar
circumstances in the case and the fact that the petitioner is
in probation in the post of Municipal Secretary, the court
below shall dispose of the matter, expeditiously.
Sd/-
(B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE)
